mapper.select:
select a.stcd, sum(a.drp) drp, b.stnm, c.adcd, c.adnm from ST_PPTN_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd
left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd
left join ST_STSMTASK_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd
where a.tm > #{stm} and a.tm <= #{etm} and a.intv = 1 and a.drp > 0 and b.sttp like '%p%' and d.pfl = 1
and c.adcd in
#{item}
group by a.stcd, b.stnm, c.adcd, c.adnm

select a.stcd, a.tm, a.drp, b.stnm, b.rvnm, b.hnnm, b.bsnm, b.lgtd, b.lttd, b.stlc, b.addvcd, b.dtmnm, b.dtmel, b.dtpr, b.sttp, b.frgrd, b.esstym, b.bgfrym, b.atcunit, b.admauth, b.locality, b.stbk, b.stazt, b.dstrvm, b.drna, b.phcd, b.usfl, b.comments, b.moditime, c.adcd, c.adnm from ST_PPTN_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd
left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd
left join ST_STSMTASK_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd
where a.stcd = #{stcd} and a.tm > #{stm} and a.tm <= #{etm} and a.intv = 1 and a.drp > 0 and a.drp is not null and b.sttp like '%p%' and d.pfl = 1
order by a.tm

select a.stcd, a.drp, a.tm, b.stnm, c.adcd, c.adnm from ST_PPTN_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd
left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd
left join ST_STSMTASK_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd
where a.tm > #{stm} and a.tm <= #{etm} and a.intv = 1 and a.drp > 0 and a.drp is not null and b.sttp like '%p%' and d.pfl = 1
and c.adcd in
#{item}
order by a.stcd, a.tm

select a.stcd, a.tm, a.drp, b.stnm, b.rvnm, b.hnnm, b.bsnm, b.lgtd, b.lttd, b.stlc, b.addvcd, b.dtmnm, b.dtmel, b.dtpr, b.sttp, b.frgrd, b.esstym, b.bgfrym, b.atcunit, b.admauth, b.locality, b.stbk, b.stazt, b.dstrvm, b.drna, b.phcd, b.usfl, b.comments, b.moditime, c.adcd, c.adnm from ST_PPTN_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd
left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd
left join ST_STSMTASK_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd
where a.stcd = #{stcd} and a.tm > #{stm} and a.tm <= #{etm} and a.intv = 1 and a.drp > 0 and a.drp is not null and b.sttp like '%p%' and d.pfl = 1
order by a.tm

select a.stcd, sum(a.drp) drp, b.stnm, c.adcd, c.adnm from ST_PPTN_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd
left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd
left join ST_STSMTASK_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd
where a.tm > #{stm} and a.tm <= #{etm} and a.intv = 1 and b.sttp like '%p%' and d.pfl = 1
group by a.stcd, b.stnm, c.adcd, c.adnm
order by adcd
select adcd, adnm from DJ_AD order by adcd

select a.stcd, a.stnm, a.rvnm, a.hnnm, a.bsnm, a.lgtd, a.lttd, a.stlc, a.addvcd, a.dtmnm, a.dtmel, a.dtpr, a.sttp, a.frgrd, a.esstym, a.bgfrym, a.atcunit, a.admauth, a.locality, a.stbk, a.stazt, a.dstrvm, a.drna, a.phcd, a.usfl, a.comments, a.moditime, b.adcd, b.adnm
from ST_STBPRP_B a , DJ_AD b
where a.stcd = #{stcd} and b.adcd = a.addvcd
